com.teamdev.jxbrowser.chromium

Interface PopupContainer


  • public interface PopupContainer
    Each container that can be used for newly created browser must implement this interface.
    可以用于新创建的浏览器的每个容器都必须实现此接口。

    • Method Summary

      All Methods  Instance Methods  Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void insertBrowser(Browser browser, java.awt.Rectangle initialBounds)
      Notification is called when newly created browser instance should be inserted into the parent container and displayed.
      当应将新创建的浏览器实例插入父容器并显示时，将调用通知。

    • Method Detail

      • insertBrowser

        void insertBrowser(Browser browser,
                   java.awt.Rectangle initialBounds)
        Notification is called when newly created browser instance should be inserted into the parent container and displayed. The initialBounds parameter contains popup window bounds on the screen.

        When popup window is opened via the window.open('url','target','left=0, top=0, width=100, height=100') JavaScript function, the initialBounds will contain the Rectangle(0, 0, 100, 100) value.
        当应将新创建的浏览器实例插入父容器并显示时，将调用通知。 initialBounds参数包含屏幕上的弹出窗口边界。当通过window.open（'url'，'target'，'left = 0，top = 0，width = 100，height = 100'）JavaScript函数打开弹出窗口时，initialBounds将包含Rectangle（0，0 ，100，100）值。
        Parameters:
        browser - the newly created browser. -新创建的浏览器。
        initialBounds - initial bounds of popup window. -弹出窗口的初始边界。
